root.title: La-Ventil {appName}
root.description: La-Ventil is the community platform for members, machines, and open badges.

public.title: La-Ventil — Access
public.description: Create an account or sign in to access your member space.

hub.title: La-Ventil — Member Space
hub.description: Manage your profile, badges, machines, and events.

home.messageOnboarding: To get started, please fill in the information below.

errors.network: Unable to reach the server. Check your connection and try again.

validation.emailAlreadyUsed: This email address is already in use.
validation.imageInvalidType: Invalid image type. Please upload png, jpg, gif or webp.
validation.emailInvalid: The email address is not valid.

password.minLength: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
password.maxLength: Your password must be at most 20 characters.
password.uppercaseRequired: Your password must include at least one uppercase letter.
password.lowercaseRequired: Your password must include at least one lowercase letter.
password.numberRequired: Your password must include at least one number.
password.specialCharacterRequired: Your password must include at least one special character (!@#$%^&*).

signup.termsRequired: You must accept the privacy policy.

profile.termsRequired: You must accept the privacy policy.

resetPassword.success: If your email exists in our database, a password reset link has been sent to you.

placeholders.passwordConfirmation: same password as the previous field

messages.emailVerificationSent: A verification email has been sent.
messages.emailChangePending: An email change is pending for {email}.
messages.emailChangeCanceled: The email change has been canceled.

home.messageOnboarding: To get started, please fill in the information below.
home.coverAlt: Illustration of La-Ventil, a Repair Café makerspace and learning hub.

forgotPassword.title: I forgot my password
forgotPassword.intro: Enter the email you used to sign up.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.subtitle: Information
signup.intro: Welcome to the La-Ventil app. To get started, please fill in the information below.

login.title: Sign in
login.subtitle: Sign in
login.emailVerifiedNotice: Your email has been confirmed. Please sign in again.

legalNotice.title: Legal notice
legalNotice.intro: The following information is provided in accordance with applicable law.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.content: La Ventil — association / organization. To be completed.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This page explains how your data is collected and used.

dataCollected.title: Data collected
dataCollected.content: User account, profile information, reservations, badges.

purposes.title: Purposes
purposes.content: Account management, reservations, badges and communications.

retention.title: Retention
retention.content: Data is kept for as long as the account remains active.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: You can request access, correction or deletion of your data.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Information
settings.intro: Update your account information with the sections below.

openBadges.title: Open badge administration
openBadges.subtitle: Information
openBadges.intro: Manage open badges and their levels.

assignModal.title: Assign an open badge
assignModal.subtitle: Choose the level and the user.
assignModal.error: Unable to assign the open badge.

levels.min: At least one level is required

delivery.title: Issuance
delivery.description: If checked, a non-admin user can issue the open badge once they reach a specific level.

activation.title: Activation
activation.description: If the badge is active, it can be assigned to users.
activation.note: If linked to a machine, that machine will also become inactive.

badgeRequirement.title: Open badge required to use the machine
badgeRequirement.description: If checked, the machine will be linked to an open badge to validate its use and reservation. If unchecked, the machine can be used without prior training and reserved by any user.

activation.title: Activation
activation.description: If the machine is active, it can be used and reserved by users. If disabled, it will no longer appear in the list of available machines.

assignModal.title: Assign an open badge
assignModal.subtitle: Choose the level and the user concerned.
assignModal.error: Unable to assign the open badge.

profile.subtitle: Information
profile.intro: Find all the information related to your account below

profileSettings.title: User profile
profileSettings.subtitle: Information
profileSettings.intro: Update your account information with the sections below.
profileSettings.emailIntro: Update the email address associated with your account.
profileSettings.passwordIntro: Change your password to keep your account secure.

fabLab.title: Fab lab
fabLab.subtitle: Information
fabLab.intro: Find all the machines available at La-Ventil

card.title: Machine name
card.description: The machine prints 3D parts by depositing melted polymer filament.

modal.reservationIntro: View the machine daily schedule. Click a slot to reserve.

reservationForm.description: Select a start time and the duration of your reservation.
reservationForm.participantsHint: If you need other people for this reservation, add them here.
reservationForm.unauthorized: You must be signed in to reserve a machine.
reservationForm.badgeRequired: You need the required open badge to reserve this machine.
reservationForm.startsAtInPast: You cannot reserve a past time slot.
reservationForm.overlap: This time slot is already reserved.

openBadges.title: Open Badge
openBadges.subtitle: Information
openBadges.intro: Find available and earned open badges below.

assignModal.title: Assign an open badge
assignModal.subtitle: Choose the level and the user.
assignModal.error: Unable to assign the open badge.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Information
support.intro: Help us improve the La-Ventil app!
support.contact: Found a bug? Send an email to loic.marleix@gmail.com

repository.title: Open source
repository.text: This project is open source. Find the code on GitHub:

guidelines.title: Include several details in your message:

items.subject: use the subject Ventil O.S. - bug
items.details: describe the issue as precisely as possible. Which section of the app? Which button?
items.device: include your phone model and the browser you used to access Ventil O.S.

profileSelector.title: Usage profile
profileSelector.subtitle: Select the profile that matches how you use the place

ventilacteur.label: Ventil'acteur
ventilacteur.description: I learn and participate weekly in the La-Ventil project

eleveLycee.label: High school student
eleveLycee.description: I want to use La-Ventil outside class hours

enseignant.label: Teacher
enseignant.description: I work at the school and use La-Ventil

intervenant.label: Guest speaker
intervenant.description: I run workshops and work within La-Ventil

visiteur.label: Visitor
visiteur.description: I come to La-Ventil to attend an event

signup.success: Registration successful! Check your email to verify your account.
